Room.Name: Main Platform
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing on the middle platform, above the Center Ring.
Room.LongDescription: This is the platform shared by both trapeze artists and tightrope walkers. It is much larger than the other two platforms and a little higher. A large ladder is the only way down from here. You can make out people cheering in the audience and performers in the rings below. Some of them are pointing in your direction. They are probably wondering why you are up here, and why you don't have a costume on. The trapeze looks like the safest way to exit from here. Maybe if you were quite dextrous, you could walk across the highwire.
